name: Iro Ga Aru
description:
The gods are angry at the people of the land and have taken away all of the color. You play as the hero Niji, the daughter of the Shogun, gifted with a paint brush that can paint the world. Adventure through the world as you try to restore color to the land. Fight through many different monsters based on Japanese folklore using the power of color.

  • Experience an action packed 2D-platforming adventure.
  • Defeat many different types of enemies using and mixing colors.
  • Learn the fundamentals of the game with your Sensei.
  • Adventure through 3 uniquely themed levels.
  • Play it on the go with the Android version!
  • Can you fully restore color to the world?

Made for the UT GAMMA program.
